select s.no as no ,s.movie_no as movie_no ,s.theater_name as theater_name ,s.screen_time as screen_time ,m.title as title ,m.runtime as runtime ,(select sum(t.available) from t_seat t where s.no = t.schedule_no ) as seat_cnt from t_schedule s join t_movie m on m.no = s.movie_no
s.screen_time between to_date(#{screenTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{screenTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND
and s.movie_no=#{movieNo}
order by screen_time

select s.no as no, s.movie_no as movie_no, s.theater_name as theater_name, s.screen_time as screen_time, m.title as title, m.runtime as runtime, t.no as seat_no, t.seat_name as seat_name, t.available as available from t_schedule s join t_movie m on m.no = s.movie_no left join t_seat t on s.no = t.schedule_no where s.no = #{no}

select s.no as no, s.movie_no as movie_no, s.theater_name as theater_name, s.screen_time as screen_time, m.title as title, m.runtime as runtime from t_schedule s join t_movie m on m.no = s.movie_no where s.no = #{no}
